Rules.InvariantScript: If(showFilter, Set(showFilter, false), Set(showSorting, false); Set(showFilter, true));
If(showSorting, Set(showSorting, false), Set(showSorting, true);Set(showFilter, false));

Switch(Dropdown_productDisplay.Selected.Value, 
Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_ByStorage, Set(byStorage, true); Set(byBatch, false); Set(byStatus, false),
Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_ByBatch, Set(byStorage, false); Set(byBatch, true); Set(byStatus, false),
Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_ByStatus, Set(byStorage, false); Set(byBatch, false); Set(byStatus, true))

If(sortByAvaPhy,
    SortByColumns(
        Filter('Inventory onhand mobile entry (mserp)', 
            'GUID string type' = userId &&
            AggregateType = 'InventInventoryOnHandMobileAggregateType (mserp)'.InventStatus && 
            (!useMySiteAndWhs || Site = selectedSite && (IsBlank(selectedWarehouse) || Warehouse = selectedWarehouse)) &&
            (IsEmpty(chosenColors) || Color in chosenColors) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenStyles) || Style in chosenStyles) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenSizes) || Size in chosenSizes) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenConfigs) || Configuration in chosenConfigs) &&
            'Available physical' >= minAvaPhy &&
            (maxAvaPhy = 0 || 'Available physical' <= maxAvaPhy)),
        "mserp_availphysical", SortOrder.Descending
    ),
    SortByColumns(
        Filter('Inventory onhand mobile entry (mserp)', 
            'GUID string type' = userId &&
            AggregateType = 'InventInventoryOnHandMobileAggregateType (mserp)'.InventStatus && 
            (!useMySiteAndWhs || Site = selectedSite && (IsBlank(selectedWarehouse) || Warehouse = selectedWarehouse)) &&
            (IsEmpty(chosenColors) || Color in chosenColors) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenStyles) || Style in chosenStyles) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenSizes) || Size in chosenSizes) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenConfigs) || Configuration in chosenConfigs) &&
            'Available physical' >= minAvaPhy &&
            (maxAvaPhy = 0 || 'Available physical' <= maxAvaPhy)),
        "mserp_inventsiteid",SortOrder.Ascending, "mserp_inventlocationid"
    )
)
selectedProduct = ThisItem.'Inventory status' & ThisItem.Site & ThisItem.Warehouse & ThisItem.Size & ThisItem.Color & ThisItem.Style & ThisItem.Configuration
If(selectedProduct = ThisItem.'Inventory status' & ThisItem.Site & ThisItem.Warehouse & ThisItem.Size & ThisItem.Color & ThisItem.Style & ThisItem.Configuration, false, true)

Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Site & " " & ThisItem.Site & "     " & "Whs: " & ThisItem.Warehouse & "     " &

If(sortByAvaPhy,
    SortByColumns(

            (!useMySiteAndWhs || Site = selectedSite) &&
            (IsEmpty(chosenColors) || Color in chosenColors) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenStyles) || Style in chosenStyles) && 
            (IsEmpty(chosenSizes) || Size in chosenSizes) &&

If(selectedProduct = ThisItem.Site & ThisItem.Size & ThisItem.Color & ThisItem.Style & ThisItem.Configuration, false, true)

If(IsBlank(ThisItem.Size), "", Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Size & ": " & ThisItem.Size & "     ") &

selectedProduct = ThisItem.Site & ThisItem.Size & ThisItem.Color & ThisItem.Style & ThisItem.Configuration

If(sortByAvaPhy,

        Filter('Inventory onhand mobile entry (mserp)',
            'GUID string type' = userId &&
            AggregateType = 'InventInventoryOnHandMobileAggregateType (mserp)'.Warehouse &&

If(
    Switch(
        ThisItem.name,
        "Color",
        selectedInvDimColors,
        "Size",
        selectedInvDimSizes,
        "Style",
        selectedInvDimStyles,
        "Config",
        selectedInvDimConfigs
    ) = "",
    false,
    true
)

If(ThisItem.IsChosen,
UpdateIf(
    Switch(Gallery_InventDim.Selected.name,
        "Color", allColors,
        "Size",  allSizes, 
        "Style", allStyles, 
        "Config", allConfigs), 
    Value = ThisItem.Value, 
    { IsChosen: false }),
UpdateIf(

    Value = ThisItem.Value, 
    { IsChosen: true }))
